SEARCH
Package icyllis.arc3d.sketch

Class Vertices

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.sketch.Vertices
public class Vertices extends Object
An immutable set of vertex data that can be used with Canvas.drawVertices(icyllis.arc3d.sketch.Vertices, icyllis.arc3d.sketch.Blender, icyllis.arc3d.sketch.Paint).
